name: Space Exit
shortDescription: A fast-paced, sci-fi endless runner game where a futuristic character runs through a space tunnel collecting coins and diamonds.
fullDescription:
Space Exit is a 3D endless runner set within a futuristic, neon-lit space tunnel. Players control a character in a sci-fi suit, navigating the tubular environment from a third-person, over-the-shoulder perspective.

Key Features:

  • Endless Runner Gameplay: Features fast-paced action requiring quick reflexes to avoid obstacles.
  • Sci-Fi Setting: Navigate a vibrant, futuristic, neon-lit space tunnel environment.
  • Collectibles: Collect two forms of in-game currency: gold **Coins** and green **Diamonds**.
  • High Score Goal: The primary objective is to achieve the highest score possible.
